title: Pet Care available at East Perimeter Pointe Apartments! Ask for details!
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom  1 Bathroom | 770 - 889 sq ft | $1188/Month', 'East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'The thriving neighborhood of East Decatur is uniquely suited to your apartment needs, offering peace and tranquility while keeping you engaged with the culture and excitement of the greater Atlanta area.', 'You can enjoy a mere 15-minute drive to downtown Decatur and a short 20-minute drive to the airport.', "You'll also have easy access to nearby Atlanta Transit for your commuting needs.", "There's simply no reason not to make these singular Decatur, GA Apartments your new home.", 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Cable Ready', '● Cozy Fireplaces', '● Custom Paint Tone', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Garbage Disposal', '● Island Kitchens', '● Linen Closet', '● Fully Equipped Kitchens w/Frost-Free Refrigerator', '● Hardwood Flooring', '● Newly Renovated Apartments', '● Patio or Balcony Options', '● Roommate Floor Plans', '● Townhomes Available', '● Upgraded Lighting Package', '● Washer & Dryer Connections', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● 24 Hour Availability', '● Accepts Electronic Payments', '● BBQ Area', '● Common Area Wi-Fi', '● Community/Onsite Parking', '● Fax/Copy Services', '● Gated Access', '● Online Leasing', '● On-Site Maintenance', '● Outdoor Area', '● Electronic Rent Payment', '● Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '● Monthly Resident Events', '● On-site Maintenance Management', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Public Transportation', '● Racquetball Court(s)', '● Resident Referral Bonuses', '● Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pets: A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'C12E7C9B78AD474E']
